nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 62

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 62 is the sixty-second issue of the weekly magazine Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2, published by De Agostini. It discusses fitting the dome panels and installing the mountings for the build-able R2-D2.
